title: New: Baths – Butts
content:
43% genius, 42% hilarity and 36% purely weird … those percentages make about as much sense as this track itself.

Baths aka Will Wiesenfeld has been one of my favourite producers for a long time now, and Butts shows off the more, let’s call it, playful side to his music. With a beat choppier than the North Sea combined with the occasionally shout of ‘butt’, it’s quite unlike anything you’ve heard before, and probably anything you’ll ever hear again. (P.S. what’s almost as good as the song itself is that people have gone along the Soundcloud timeline and commented ‘Butts’ everytime the word appears; I love you internet).
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
